title: Elegant 22KT Gold Diamond Bangles - Traditional Sparkle, Modern Style
materials: brilliant-cut Diamonds. Total gross weight: 38.120 gms
Diamond weight: 4.48 (56) carats. Features the signature Hyderabadi polish for enduring luster.
features: These delicate bangles feature a linear design with evenly spaced, prong-set brilliant-cut diamonds. The design offers a modern minimalist aesthetic while retaining the classic elegance of gold jewelry. The secure setting ensures each diamond shines with maximum brilliance.
occasions: and makes an ideal gift for anniversaries and birthdays. Suitable for formal and casual settings alike.
description: Crafted from pure 22KT gold, these bangles offer a timeless investment in your jewelry collection. The brilliant-cut diamonds add a touch of luxury and sparkle, making them an instant favorite. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these bangles seamlessly blend traditional purity with modern design.
